titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Halosulfuron-Methyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on methyl 5-(((4,6,-dimethoxy-2-pyrimidinyl)amino) carbonylaminosulfonyl) -3-chloro-1-methyl-1-H-pyrazole-4- carboxylate (halosulfuron-methyl).
